title: RR Multi File Demo
instructions: Run the code to and then use the replay to see the variable state.
starter:
from dice import roll

num_dice = input("How many dice? ")
num_dice = int(num_dice)
num_rolls = input("How many rolls? ")
num_rolls = int(num_rolls)

for i in range(num_rolls):
    rolls = roll(num_dice)
    print(rolls)
print("Done")

files./main.py:
from dice import roll

num_dice = input("How many dice? ")
num_dice = int(num_dice)
num_rolls = input("How many rolls? ")
num_rolls = int(num_rolls)

for i in range(num_rolls):
    rolls = roll(num_dice)
    print(rolls)
print("Done")
files.dice.py:
import random

def roll(n):
    """Roll n 6 sided dice and return the rolls as a list"""
    rolls = [random.randint(1, 6) for i in range(n)]
    return rolls
